moves.4. d4: ? This loses a pawn. You're not supposed to play this until c2c3.
moves.4... Bxd4: So I snap up the pawn
moves.5. Ng5 Nh6: This seemed the best way to defend against the attack.
moves.6... g6: ?? I block the attack but lose my knight
moves.7. Qxh6 Qf6: So I try to get an attack going myself
moves.8. Bxf7+ Kd8 9. g3: This is a big mistake. He should have dealt with my attack of f2
moves.9... Qxf2+ 10. Kd1 d5: If he doesn't notice it I've got mate
moves.11. Nxh7: He greedily snaps up another pawn
moves.11... Bg4#: And my bishop comes around and checkmates the white king. As usual, please comment.
